short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extens√£o para monitorar abas em inatividade no navegador

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bit Tabs is a powerful extension designed to monitor and manage inactive tabs in your browser. With Bit Tabs, you can effectively organize and optimize your browsing experience by setting a maximum inactivity time for tabs. The extension intelligently detects idle tabs and provides options to either close or bookmark them, helping you declutter your browser and improve performance.
